Html: How can I select the audio device in NAudio ? And how can I get a List of audio devices ?

are you using WaveOut? You can set the DeviceNumber property. Use WaveOut.DeviceCount to find out how many devices. Use WaveOut.GetCapabilities to get information about a particular device.

Mark
Does does not really explain how I can SELECT the device I want, it just explains, how I can read the devices... (and by device I mean things like "Front Speak", "Line 1", etc...)
Select the device by setting the DeviceNumber property.
